description: BR-21 is the District Transport Office for Nalanda, headquartered in the historic city of Bihar Sharif. The office serves as a critical hub for vehicle registration and licensing in a region renowned for its educational heritage and proximity to the ancient Nalanda University. It manages transport regulation across 20 blocks, ensuring compliance with the Motor Vehicles Act within this significant administrative and cultural district.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Campus, Bihar Sharif, Nalanda, Bihar
